Categorize this IT Ticket:

access request for knight access request for hello please find attached latest could you kindly check his if everything look expected thank you best regards analyst en ext sent tuesday access request for hello thank you for handling swiftly informed his credentials currently we waiting for confirmation his side best regards analyst sent tuesday access request for hello everyone thank you for bringing up our attention kindly note created kindly ask for your assistance granting him access kindly ask you notify his credentials password should you require further assistance please hesitate contact thank you kindest regards analyst ext hub sent access request for hello could you kindly assist with below request for access ticket reference logged our side thank you best regards analyst en ext sent tuesday re access request hi please could open request similar own permit access for documents below link any passwords etc can be sent directly check when returns annual leave thanks head leeds ab sent re access request works fine thanks head leeds ab sent re access request attention message originates outside hi you should have access here can you please check thanks sent friday re access request hi could you take look approving access please need review reports thanks head leeds ab sent re access request works but had provide reasons for access head leeds ab sent thursday re access request same again head leeds ab sent re access request attention message originates outside hi can you please try accessing sp via link regards manager sent thursday access request hi trying access curl reason but being prompted for authentication please could request access credentials allow view document repository thanks head leeds ab please consider environment before printing message should be regarded confidential if you have received error please notify destroy immediately statements intent shall only become binding when confirmed hard copy by signatory contents relate dealings with other companies under control details can be found please consider environment before printing message should be regarded confidential if you have received error please notify destroy immediately **Determining the Category**

**Narrowing the Focus**

It looks like "Access" is the main category, as the phrases point to it consistently. I'm double-checking to ensure no other categories are necessary, but the language used strongly leans towards an access-related issue.
